title: John Smith on the Virginia colony - context

content.prompt: Smith’s description of the Pamunkey people’s interactions with the Virginia colonists best serves as evidence of which of the following characteristics of American Indians along the Eastern Seaboard in the 1600s?

topic.text: 1.2: Native American Societies Before European Contact

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
